sections.sectionSummary: This is a fake study focused on learning about ResearchKit. In the process we will analyze links between physical activity and happiness.
sections.sectionDetail:
This is a fake study focused on learning about ResearchKit. In the process we will analyze links between physical activity and happiness.
We hope you enjoy the study

sections.sectionSummary: Throughout this study the app will collect information from your iPhone about the number of steps you take each day.
sections.sectionDetail: Throughout this study the app will collect information from your iPhone about the number of steps you take each day. We will also ask you questions from time-to-time

sections.sectionSummary: We will keep your data private.
sections.sectionDetail: We will keep your data private, Seriously.

sections.sectionSummary: Your data will only be used for the research purposes associated with this study. Your data will not be shared with any commercial enity without your prior written consent.
sections.sectionDetail:
Your data will only be used for the research purposes associated with this study. Your data will not be shared with any commercial enity without your prior written consent.

For more information please contact the study organizer.

sections.sectionSummary: This study should take less than 5 minutes per day over a 1 month period. Each day you will be asked to answer a few questions about your day.
sections.sectionDetail: This study should take less than 5 minutes per day over a 1 month period. Each day you will be asked to answer a few questions about your day.

sections.sectionSummary: If at anytime you wish to withdraw from the study simply delete the app from you iPhone.
sections.sectionDetail: If at anytime you wish to withdraw from the study simply delete the app from you iPhone.
